location: Pedatadepalli, Tadepalligudem, West Godavari, Andhra Pradesh
accreditation: AICTE Approved, NAAC Accredited with 'A' Grade, NBA Accredited
undergraduate courses: B.Tech in CSE, CSE(AI), CSE(DS), AI & ML, CST, ECE, EEE, ME, CE

admission process: B.Tech admissions through AP EAPCET; M.Tech/MBA through relevant entrance exams and merit

placement highlights: Top recruiters include Infosys, TCS, Wipro, Cognizant; Highest package ~₹13 LPA
